body_html:
I've heard one report of a developer/data scientist using Jupyter for his day-to-day work, as a replacement for a code editor.
I don't know if it's very common, but if it is, it would probably warrant keeping a GPU + Jupyter image.

body:
I've heard one report of a developer/data scientist using Jupyter for his day-to-day work, as a replacement for a code editor.
I don't know if it's very common, but if it is, it would probably warrant keeping a GPU + Jupyter image.
